name: nginx
description: Manejo de todo el trafico entrante de Garba

scripts.start: npm run clean_dockers && docker run -d -e APP_ENV=test -p 80:80 -p 81:81 --name garba-nginx --link test-nginx:test-server garba-nginx
scripts.restart: npm stop && npm test && npm start
scripts.clean-dockers-circleci: docker ps -a | grep garba-nginx | awk '{print $1}' | xargs -r docker rm -f || true
scripts.clean-dockers-mac: docker ps -a | grep garba-nginx | awk '{print $1}' | xargs docker rm -f
scripts.start-test-server: cd test-server && npm run docker-build && npm run clean_dockers && npm run docker-start
scripts.check_cases: npm start && cd tests && docker run $(linked.domains.sh) -v $(pwd):/tests test-nginx /tests/run.cases.sh
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run start-test-server && npm run check_syntax && npm run check_cases
